Our Team Home Products Back Metal Forming Manufacturing Automation Press Equipment Resources Back Metal Forming Catalog Manufacturing Automation Catalog Press Equipment Catalog CAD Services Back The Ajacs Advantage Global Operations Educational and Technical Services Our Team Back Our Team Careers About Us Back History News Quality Policy Hunt with the Hat Back Prize Drawing Rules Submit a Photo Mailing List Signup Photo Gallery Terms of Sale Vision, Mission, Values Line Card Contact Us Back Contact Form Upload Files SEARCH Our Team What gives a company like Ajacs its character? A significant portion comes from history—the years we've invested in building a solid experience base and reputation. The other significant aspect of our character stems from the people who make up Ajacs—their talents, commitment, and the relationships they have with our customers and business partners. Our focus on people stems from being a family-owned, community-oriented business. At Ajacs, we believe that all these things aren't just superfluous—they're at the very heart of who we are and why our customers enjoy doing business with us. We are fortunate to have recruited a team of individuals who embody everything you'd want in a colleague or sales contact. They're personable, funny, caring, conscientious, highly experienced, and, well, very real. Get the inside scoop (ice cream pun intended!) on who we are below.
